package ifDemo;

public class IfDemo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		double first=50.30; //initialized statement
		double second=50.5; 
		double max;
		if(first>second) 
		{ 
			max=first;
		}
		else 
		{
			max=second;
		}
		System.out.println("max is: "+max);
	}

}
